examples: I'm a light sleeper : I get woken up by the smallest of sounds.
She's a heavy sleeper : it takes a lot to wake her up.

definitions.definition: That which lies dormant , as a law .
A spy , saboteur , or terrorist who lives unobtrusively in a community until activated by a prearranged signal ; may be part of a sleeper cell .
A small starter earring , worn to prevent a piercing from closing.

examples: We spent a night on an uncomfortable sleeper between Athens and Vienna.

definitions.definition: ( martial arts , wrestling ) A sleeper hold .
Something that achieves unexpected success after an interval of time.
examples: A box-office bomb when it first came out, the film was a sleeper , becoming much more popular decades after being released.

definitions.definition: Any of family Odontobutidae of goby -like bottom-feeding freshwater fish.
A type of pajama for a person, especially a child, that covers the whole body, including the feet.
examples: Aaron, Devin, and Laura looked so comfy in their sleepers .

definitions.definition: ( automotive , slang ) An automobile which has been internally modified to excess, while retaining a mostly stock appearance in order to fool opponents in a drag race, or to avoid the attention of the police.
( slang , gambling ) A bet placed on the gambling table and then forgotten about by the gambler.
( science fiction ) A pod or similar device containing a person in cryosleep .

secondary_definitions: That which lies dormant , as a law .
A spy , saboteur , or terrorist who lives unobtrusively in a community until activated by a prearranged signal ; may be part of a sleeper cell .
A small starter earring , worn to prevent a piercing from closing.
( martial arts , wrestling ) A sleeper hold .
Something that achieves unexpected success after an interval of time.
Any of family Odontobutidae of goby -like bottom-feeding freshwater fish.
A type of pajama for a person, especially a child, that covers the whole body, including the feet.

( automotive , slang ) An automobile which has been internally modified to excess, while retaining a mostly stock appearance in order to fool opponents in a drag race, or to avoid the attention of the police.
( slang , gambling ) A bet placed on the gambling table and then forgotten about by the gambler.

definitions.definition: A structural beam in a floor running perpendicular to both the joists beneath and floorboards above.
A heavy floor timber in a ship's bottom.
The lowest, or bottom, tier of casks .

main_definition: ( rail transport , British ) A railroad tie .
secondary_definitions: ( carpentry ) A structural beam in a floor running perpendicular to both the joists beneath and floorboards above.
( nautical ) A heavy floor timber in a ship's bottom.
( nautical ) The lowest, or bottom, tier of casks .
